mapper.sql: id, dispatch_no, state, remark, warehouse_id, create_id, creator, create_time, update_id, updator, update_time, audit_id, auditor, audit_time ,company_id
mapper.select:
select
from warehouse.dispatch
and id like concat('%',#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and dispatch_no like concat('%',#{dispatchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and state like concat('%',#{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and remark like concat('%',#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and warehouse_id like concat('%',#{warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and create_id like concat('%',#{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and creator like concat('%',#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and create_time like concat('%',#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and update_id like concat('%',#{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and updator like concat('%',#{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and update_time like concat('%',#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and audit_id like concat('%',#{auditId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and auditor like concat('%',#{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and audit_time like concat('%',#{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')

insert into dispatch(id, dispatch_no, state, remark, warehouse_id, create_id, creator, create_time, update_id, updator, update_time, audit_id, auditor, audit_time) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dispatchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.auditId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update warehouse.dispatch
dispatch_no = #{dispatchNo},
state = #{state},
remark = #{remark},
warehouse_id = #{warehouseId},
create_id = #{createId},
creator = #{creator},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_id = #{updateId},
updator = #{updator},
update_time = #{updateTime},
audit_id = #{auditId},
auditor = #{auditor},
audit_time = #{auditTime},
company_id = #{companyId},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select
from warehouse.dispatch where state = '3'
and id like concat('%',#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and dispatch_no like concat('%',#{dispatchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and remark like concat('%',#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and warehouse_id like concat('%',#{warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and creator like concat('%',#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and create_time like concat('%',#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and update_id like concat('%',#{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and updator like concat('%',#{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and update_time like concat('%',#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and audit_id like concat('%',#{auditId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and auditor like concat('%',#{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and audit_time like concat('%',#{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and company_id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select dispatch.id as id, dispatch.dispatch_no as dispatchNo, dispatch.state as state, dispatch.remark as remark, dispatch.warehouse_id as warehouseId, warehouse.name as warehouseName, dispatch.create_id as createId, dispatch.creator as creator, dispatch.create_time as createTime, dispatch.update_id as update_id, dispatch.updator as updator, dispatch.update_time as updateTime, dispatch.audit_id as auditId, dispatch.auditor as auditor, dispatch.audit_time as auditTime, dispatch.company_id as companyId from warehouse.dispatch,warehouse.warehouse where warehouse.dispatch.warehouse_id = warehouse.warehouse.id and warehouse.dispatch.create_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and id like concat('%',#{dispatch.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and dispatch_no like concat('%',#{dispatch.dispatchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and state like concat('%',#{dispatch.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and remark like concat('%',#{dispatch.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and warehouse_id like concat('%',#{dispatch.warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and create_time like concat('%',#{dispatch.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and update_id like concat('%',#{dispatch.updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and updator like concat('%',#{dispatch.updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and update_time like concat('%',#{dispatch.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and audit_id like concat('%',#{dispatch.auditId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and auditor like concat('%',#{dispatch.auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and audit_time like concat('%',#{dispatch.auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and dispatch.company_id =#{dispatch.companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by dispatch.update_time desc

select dispatch.id as id, dispatch.dispatch_no as dispatchNo, dispatch.state as state, dispatch.remark as remark, dispatch.warehouse_id as warehouseId, warehouse.name as warehouseName, dispatch.create_id as createId, dispatch.creator as creator, dispatch.create_time as createTime, dispatch.update_id as update_id, dispatch.updator as updator, dispatch.update_time as updateTime, dispatch.audit_id as auditId, dispatch.auditor as auditor, dispatch.audit_time as auditTime, dispatch.company_id as companyId from warehouse.dispatch,warehouse.warehouse where warehouse.dispatch.warehouse_id = warehouse.warehouse.id and warehouse.dispatch.audit_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and warehouse.dispatch.state = 0
and id like concat('%',#{dispatch.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and dispatch_no like concat('%',#{dispatch.dispatchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and state like concat('%',#{dispatch.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and remark like concat('%',#{dispatch.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and warehouse_id like concat('%',#{dispatch.warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and create_id = #{dispatch.createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and creator like concat('%',#{dispatch.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and create_time like concat('%',#{dispatch.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and update_id like concat('%',#{dispatch.updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and updator like concat('%',#{dispatch.updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and update_time like concat('%',#{dispatch.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and audit_time like concat('%',#{dispatch.auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and dispatch.company_id =#{dispatch.companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by dispatch.update_time desc

select dispatch.id as id, dispatch.dispatch_no as dispatchNo, dispatch.state as state, dispatch.remark as remark, dispatch.warehouse_id as warehouseId, warehouse.name as warehouseName, dispatch.create_id as createId, dispatch.creator as creator, dispatch.create_time as createTime, dispatch.update_id as update_id, dispatch.updator as updator, dispatch.update_time as updateTime, dispatch.audit_id as auditId, dispatch.auditor as auditor, dispatch.audit_time as auditTime from warehouse.dispatch,warehouse.warehouse where warehouse.dispatch.warehouse_id = warehouse.warehouse.id and warehouse.dispatch.audit_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and warehouse.dispatch.state in (1,2,4,5)
and id like concat('%',#{dispatch.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and dispatch_no like concat('%',#{dispatch.dispatchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and state like concat('%',#{dispatch.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and remark like concat('%',#{dispatch.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and warehouse_id like concat('%',#{dispatch.warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and create_id = #{dispatch.createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and creator like concat('%',#{dispatch.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and create_time like concat('%',#{dispatch.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and update_id like concat('%',#{dispatch.updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and updator like concat('%',#{dispatch.updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and update_time like concat('%',#{dispatch.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and audit_time like concat('%',#{dispatch.auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and dispatch.company_id =#{dispatch.companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by dispatch.update_time desc
